Charge of the Conqueror.name: Charge of the Conqueror
Charge of the Conqueror.flavor: As an enemy launches an attack at your comrade, you give a defiant yell and charge across the battlefield at the foe.
Charge of the Conqueror.trigger: An enemy makes an attack roll against your ally within 5 squares of you
Charge of the Conqueror.effect: The target is subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.

Sacrificial Intervention.name: Sacrificial Intervention
Sacrificial Intervention.flavor: You appeal to your god and leap to take the wound meant for an ally, condemning the foe for its insolence.
Sacrificial Intervention.trigger: An enemy hits your ally within 5 squares of you with a melee or a ranged attack
Sacrificial Intervention.target: The ally hit by the triggering enemy’s attack
Sacrificial Intervention.effect: You and the target teleport, swapping positions. The triggering enemy’s attack hits you instead. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you end your turn adjacent to the triggering enemy, it is subject to your divine sanction until the end of your next turn.

Take the Keep.name: Take the Keep
Take the Keep.flavor: You cry out, urging your foes to attack you. Your shout encourages your allies to seize enemy ground.
Take the Keep.effect: You pull each target to a square adjacent to you, and each target is subject to your divine sanction until the end of your next turn. Each ally in the burst can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier as a free action but cannot end this movement closer to you. You then make the following melee attack.
